<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon preached in St. Saviour's Church in Dartmouth, July 24th. anno Dom. 1698 Together with some refections on the opinion of those, who affirm, that the only difference between the Church and the meeting-house, is that of a few ceremonies. In a letter to a friend. By Humfry Smith, M.A. Smith, Humphry, b. 1654 or 5.
70, [2] p.
printed by Sam. Darker and Sam. Farley, for Charles Yeo, John Pearce, and Philip Bishop, Exon : 1698.
With a final errata leaf. Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
=======

In a letter to a friend. By Humfry Smith, M.A. Smith, Humphry, b. 1654 or 5.
70, [2] p.
printed by Sam. Darker and Sam. Farley, for Charles Yeo, John Pearce, and Philip Bishop, Exon : 1698.
With a final errata leaf. Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
